title: Skermunkel
author: Skermunkel
content: Hey everyone,I just launched a new Game Distribution Platform, PerMuh-G. A system exclusively geared towards Full Traditional Games.NO Micro-transactions,NO Pay To Win,NO Play To Earn,NO Arbitrary Digital Scarcity or Rarity.Only 1 Single NFT and you own the Full Game. Plus, you actually own your own copy of the game and are free to resell it, lend it to a friend, trade games or just keep it and build up your unique game collection to show it off.That's not all owning a copy will also give you exclusive utility and community benefits on our Discord server, including opportunities for Free Giveaways and Discounts.For more info check out our Full Breakdown.https://odysee.com/@Skermunkel:1/Pmg-Trailer_Odysee:8Would love to hear what eveyone's thoughts and feedabck are

comments.author: Skermunkel
comments.body: Our first PerMuh-G game, 'n Verlore Verstand, is now available on Pre-Sale, with limited slots and time to act.You can download the Free Demo version over here:https://p-verstand.skermunkel.com

comments.author: Skermunkel
comments.body: Check out our Medium article detailing the full rundown on PerMuh-G and how it aims to bring a new alternative with a Full Game, no bs, no fluff, distribution option to the NFT Gaming scene.https://medium.com/@skermunkel/permuh-g-full-game-distribution-powered-by-nfts-and-ipfs-510a9890a879
